summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Employee Directory functionality after authentication fix. All major features working correctly with 28 employees displaying as expected.

minor_issues.issue: No departments configured in the system
minor_issues.impact: Department filter only shows 'All Departments' option

passed_tests: Admin login with JWT token authentication
Search by name/email works (found 5 results for 'Test')
View employee button navigates to profile page
Employee profile page loads with working tabs
All API endpoints return correct status codes
Employee data structure contains all required fields
